name: Toggle Button Components
description: A collection of 5 stylish toggle button variations including switch, text switch, checkbox, power button, and pill switch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Toggle Button Components</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
</head>
<body>
  <button class="toggle-btn-1" id="toggle1"></button>
  <button class="toggle-btn-2" id="toggle2">OFF</button>
  <button class="toggle-btn-3" id="toggle3"></button>
  <button class="toggle-btn-4" id="toggle4"></button>
  <button class="toggle-btn-5" id="toggle5">Inactive</button>
  <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
